=================
Django-Assessment
=================

Simple appllication for managing a survey/quiz within your Django Web Site.

Installing the package
======================
Using pip::

    $ pip install django-assessment

Features
========
* RESTful API

================
* `Code repository <https://github.com/vandorjw/django-assessment>`_
